ticksPerDay.description: How many ticks there are in a day

maximumGroundDropSpillOverRange.description: How far resources heavier than groundStackMaximumWeight will spill-over to the ground.

baseMovementSpeed.description: How far a villager will move in units of cells/sec.

basePickupSpeed.description: How fast a villager will pick up resources in units of 1/sec and multiplied by the individual resource pickup multipliers.

baseWorkSpeed.description: How fast a villager will work one tick in units of 1/sec.

baseHarvestSpeed.description: How fast a villager will harvest one tick in units of 1/sec.

basePlantSpeed.description: How fast a villager will plant in ticks.

baseHungerMax.description: How much hunger can be accumulated until death.

baseHungerPerRealTimeSecond.description: How much hunger is accumulated per real time second.

baseEatSpeed.description: How fast a villager will eat resources in units of 1/sec and multiplied by the individual resource pickup multipliers.

baseHungerPercentage.description: Hunger threshold at which the villager seeks out food the next change it gets.

baseHungerEmergencyPercentage.description: Hunger threshold at which the villager drops all it's doing and seeks out food immediately.
